Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for Amsterdam City Break”

Reviews.Content: hotel short city break amsterdam boiling hot shower clean towels changed day bathroom immaculate bedroom 2 friends feeling tight walk bed 2 chairs wardrobe found english music channels tv beds daily sheets linen clean arrived service desk maps lent adapter plug hour id forgotten mine straighteners brilliant location 5 mins walk van gogh museum tram links arrives left central station 5 mins walk bars cafes breakfast andor evening cocktails brilliant location walking city centre id absolutely recommend hotel short city break
